amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections 8094 and 8095, relating to the release or transfer of detainees currently held at Guantanamo Bay to secure facilities in the United States and allow for funding to construct, acquire, or modify domestic facilities to host these relocated detainees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to strike sections 8094 and 8095, relating to the release or transfer detainees currently held at Guantanamo Bay to secure facilities in the United States and allow for funding to construct, acquire, or modify domestic facilities to host these relocated detainees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 252 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 252 (Roll no. 432).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
